parameters: "SO YOU'VE COME FOR A REMATCH AGAINST THE GREAT PAPYRUS."
"BUT I MUST WARN YOU, I HAVE SOME NEW TRICKS UP MY SLEEVE."
"...AND I MADE SURE THE DOG WON'T STEAL ANYTHING AGAIN."
"HUMAN! PREPARE FOR THE MOST GLORIOUS SHOWDOWN OF YOUR LIFE!"
"ONCE I'M DONE WITH THIS REMATCH, I'LL BE ONE STEP CLOSER TO MY DREAM!"
"I, THE GREAT PAPYRUS, WILL FINALLY BECOME A ROYAL GUARDSMAN!"
"IT’S ONLY A MATTER OF TIME, REALLY!"

"I HAVE THE SKILLS, THE CHARISMA...
AND A COOL OUTFIT!"
"THE ROYAL GUARD WON'T BE ABLE TO IGNORE MY GREATNESS ANY LONGER!"

"'PAPYRUS HAS EVERYTHING 
WE NEED IN A GUARDSMAN...
AND MORE!’"

"THEY MIGHT EVEN THROW
A CELEBRATION IN MY HONOR!"

"A PARADE WITH FLOATS! FIREWORKS!
AND GIANT STATUES OF ME!"

"THEY WILL ALL FINALLY HAVE
A REASON TO CALL ME 'THE GREAT PAPYRUS!'"
"I WILL TELL SO MANY GREAT STORIES OF MY HEROIC ACTS!!"
"LIKE THE ONE WHERE I COME OUT VICTORIOUS AGAINST A HUMAN!!"
"OF COURSE, EVEN A ROYAL GUARD NEEDS TO KEEP IMPROVING!"
"THAT’S WHY I’VE BEEN WORKING ON SOMETHING VERY SPECIAL."
"IT'S NO LONGER ABOUT BONES ANYMORE, IT'S ALL ABOUT PERFECTION!"
"BY THE TIME IT'S READY YOU'LL BE DROWNING IN A FURY OF GREATNESS!"
"AND, AS YOU MAY KNOW. A ROYAL GUARD ALWAYS NEEDS TO BE PREPARED."
"AND I AM NO EXCEPTION! I'M PREPARED FOR ANYTHING!!"
"I'LL ACE THOSE ROYAL GUARD TRYOUTS ONCE I'M DONE WITH YOU!"
"I EVEN PACKED SOME MORE BONES FOR THIS BATTLE!"
"DON'T MOVE AND, WELL... IT WON'T BE COMFORTABLE!!"
"UNDYNE WILL BE SO PROUD OF ME!"
"SHE'S TOUGH, YOU KNOW! SHE EXPECTS ONLY THE BEST..."
"I DIDN'T EXPECT YOU TO BE ABLE TO HOLD UP SO WELL!"
"HAS THE GREAT PAPYRUS MET HIS MATCH?"
"OF COURSE NOT!! REMEMBER THAT SPECIAL ATTACK I'VE MENTIONED EARLIER?"
"IT'S GETTING CLOSER... AND IT'S BETTER THAN EVER!"
"I'VE MADE TONS OF IMPROVEMENTS TO IT. GOOD WASN'T ENOUGH!!"
"MY SPECIAL ATTACK IS SO GREAT IT MIGHT JUST BLOW YOUR MIND!"
"I TOLD UNDYNE I WOULDN'T CAUSE ANY ACTUAL HEAD EXPLOSIONS."
"AS FOR ME? I'M BARELY JUST WARMING UP!"
"WE'RE ALREADY NEARING THE CLIMAX OF THIS GLORIOUS BATTLE!"
"ALL OF THIS IS LEADING UP TO ONE... FINAL... MOVE!"
"CAN YOU FEEL THE EXCITEMENT OF A PERFECT VICTORY?"
"THIS NEXT ATTACK WILL BE YOUR LAST CHANCE TO PROVE YOURSELF."

"a EE em, m t9i hUE

EE HH? ? ?[["

"* YOU WON!" + NewLine() +
"You earned 0 XP and 0 gold."
"* " + enemyName + " - ATK " + enemyStats.ATK + " DEF " + enemyStats.DEF + NewLine() + "* " + enemyStats.checkDesc
"* " + enemyName + " stares directly at your SOUL."

"* Papyrus is trying to think 
of a way to catch you off-guard."
"* You hear bones clatter around you."
"* Papyrus grins at the thought of * joining the Royal Guard."
"* The mist starts to irritate your nose."
